reviews.review_msg: Her class felt like a total joke. Although the content was very easy I feel I didn't actually learn anything about education and how to be a teacher. All we did was write poems in the woods and do improv. There was no real lecturing happening.

Sweet person and guaranteed to be the easiest class you'll ever take. All you have to do is show up and do a couple small projects. The final project was done in any way we wanted and any topic. All we had to do was present and it was so easy

I took EDUC 100W with Celeste and it was AMAZING!!! She is my favourite prof and she cares so much about each student. The course allows you to be creative and demonstrate education in anyway. I enjoyed all the field trips and class discussions. Loved this class so much and I will miss it!

Ridiculously easy class. It definitely requires most people to get out of their comfort zone, but I didn't mind playing at the park and dancing in class if it meant an easy A. Plus, the classroom community she created was beautiful! I made great friends in that class. Definitely recommend EDUC100W as a GPA booster.

Celeste is definitely one of a kind. She is always upbeat and energetic which is a different from a lot of different profs. The class is not a lot of work, but it does require you being totally involved with everything. This is one of those classes where you get marked based on effort, so as long as you try and have fun, you should get an A.
Quite possibly one of the best looking females I've ever come across.  Also, her lectures are amazing and inspirational.  I now, more than ever, believe that teaching is my calling.  Thanks Prof :)
